ðŸ§ª **Fusaka Devnet-1 EEST release v1.0.0:** https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/fusaka-devnet-1@v1.0.0

Includes an initial set of tests for EIP-7825 & EIP-7918.
Additionally some extra vectors for EIP-7823 & EIP-7883.
We may have a second devnet-1 release as we plan to add more cases to each EIP.

Please ping if there are any issues!
